title: Rudolf to Ippaiattena x Godzilla x Toho Cinemas Moving Logo Eizou
original_name: 『ルドルフとイッパイアッテナ』× ゴジラ ×TOHO シネマズムービングロゴ映像
sinopse: A collaboration promoting the Rudolf to Ippaiattena film, wherein the movie's two main characters encounter the Toho logo and Godzilla. It was aired in Toho theaters across Japan.
